title: FS/FT Joe Tinker, Walter Johnson, Burleigh Grimes - non-T206 cards
author: Clark7781

posts.post_title: FS/FT Joe Tinker, Walter Johnson, Burleigh Grimes - non-T206 cards
posts.post_content:
I'm selling/trading a lot of my misc. card collection to re-focus my collecting on the T206 set.  For awhile I was a type collector, but now I'm focusing on completing the Monster minus the Big 4.

Below are three cards up for sale/trade for T206 cards I don't have.

1920 W516-1 Walter Johnson Hand Cut, PSA graded AUTHENTIC.  There is a vertical crease running down the middle of the card and "JOHN" written on the reverse.

[IMG]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y283/Clark7781/1920W516-1WalterJohnsonPSAAuthFront.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y283/Clark7781/1920W516-1WalterJohnsonPSAAuthBack.jpg[/IMG]

1909 E90-1 Joe Tinker Amer Crml, PSA graded Authentic.  A rough looking card.  Creases and missing corner/rounded corners; a beater.

[IMG]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y283/Clark7781/1909E90AmerCrmlJoeTinkerPSAAuthFront.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y283/Clark7781/1909E90AmericanCrmlJoeTinkerPSAAuthBack.jpg[/IMG]

1923 W515-1 Burleigh Grimes Hand Cut PSA 4 (VG-Ex) Not a bad looking card for the age.

[IMG]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y283/Clark7781/1923W515-1BurleighGrimesPSAVG-EXFront.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i7.photobucket.com/albums/y283/Clark7781/1923W515-1BurleighGrimesPSA4VG-EXBack.jpg[/IMG]

Please PM or email me at [url]paulehawk3@gmail.com[/url] if you are interested in any of these cards.  Please make me an offer.
